content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a wooden chest (position (-16.5, -49.5))

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0))
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0))
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0))
- Wooden chests at positions (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -82.5), (43.5, -81.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Inserter at positions (3.5, 0.5), (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) and burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5))

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill without fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel to the burner mining drill before using it
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before using it
### Errors when using pipe connections without fluid
- Make sure that the pipe connections have the required fluid before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without input liquid
- Ensure that the steam engine has the required input liquid before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump without water
- Make sure that the offshore pump has access to water before using it
